name: 40 Winks
description: 40 Winks is an action platformer where you control brother and sister, Ruff and Tumble. Your goal is to collect 40 Winks scattered around the world to stop an evil man called Nitekap. Nitekap wants to turn the winks into hood-winks who are responsible for giving children nightmares.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4, Athlon 64 or later Memory: 750 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 799 MB available space
